00056 struct PWIZ_API_DECL UserParam
00057 {
00058     std::string name;
00059     std::string value;
00060     std::string type;
00061     CVID units;
00062 
00063     UserParam(const std::string& _name = "", 
00064               const std::string& _value = "", 
00065               const std::string& _type = "",
00066               CVID _units = CVID_Unknown);
00067 
00068     /// templated value access with type conversion
00069     template<typename value_type>
00070     value_type valueAs() const
00071     {
00072         return !value.empty() ? boost::lexical_cast<value_type>(value) 
00073                               : boost::lexical_cast<value_type>(0);
00074     } 
00075 
00076     bool empty() const;
00077     bool operator==(const UserParam& that) const;
00078     bool operator!=(const UserParam& that) const;
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00082 /// special case for bool (outside the class for gcc 3.4, and inline for msvc)
00083 template<>
00084 inline bool UserParam::valueAs<bool>() const
00085 {
00086     return value == "true";
00087 }

00094 struct PWIZ_API_DECL ParamContainer
00095 {
00096     std::vector<ParamGroupPtr> paramGroupPtrs;
00097     std::vector<CVParam> cvParams;
00098     std::vector<UserParam> userParams;
00099     
00100     /// Finds cvid in the container:
00101     /// - returns first CVParam result such that (result.cvid == cvid); 
00102     /// - if not found, returns CVParam(CVID_Unknown)
00103     /// - recursive: looks into paramGroupPtrs
00104     CVParam cvParam(CVID cvid) const; 
00105 
00106     /// Finds child of cvid in the container:
00107     /// - returns first CVParam result such that (result.cvid is_a cvid); 
00108     /// - if not found, CVParam(CVID_Unknown)
00109     /// - recursive: looks into paramGroupPtrs
00110     CVParam cvParamChild(CVID cvid) const; 
00111 
00112     /// returns true iff cvParams contains exact cvid (recursive)
00113     bool hasCVParam(CVID cvid) const;
00114 
00115     /// returns true iff cvParams contains a child (is_a) of cvid (recursive)
00116     bool hasCVParamChild(CVID cvid) const;
00117 
00118     /// Finds UserParam with specified name 
00119     /// - returns UserParam() if name not found 
00120     /// - not recursive: looks only at local userParams
00121     UserParam userParam(const std::string&) const; 
00122 
00123     /// set/add a CVParam (not recursive)
00124     void set(CVID cvid, const std::string& value = "", CVID units = CVID_Unknown);
00125 
00126     /// set/add a CVParam (not recursive)
00127     template <typename value_type>
00128     void set(CVID cvid, value_type value, CVID units = CVID_Unknown)
00129     {
00130         set(cvid, boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(value), units);
00131     }
00132 
00133     bool empty() const;
00134     bool operator==(const ParamContainer& that) const;
00135     bool operator!=(const ParamContainer& that) const;
00136 };
00137 
00138 
00139 /// special case for bool (outside the class for gcc 3.4, and inline for msvc)
00140 template<>
00141 inline void ParamContainer::set<bool>(CVID cvid, bool value, CVID units)
00142 {
00143     set(cvid, (value ? "true" : "false"), units);
00144 }

00213 struct PWIZ_API_DECL Component : public ParamContainer
00214 {
00215     ComponentType type;
00216     int order;
00217 
00218     Component() : type(ComponentType_Unknown), order(0) {}
00219     Component(ComponentType type, int order) : type(type), order(order) {}
00220     Component(CVID cvid, int order) { define(cvid, order); }
00221     virtual ~Component(){}
00222 
00223     void define(CVID cvid, int order);
00224     bool empty() const;
00225 };

00466 
00467     /// copy binary data arrays into m/z-intensity pair array
00468     /// note: this overload is to allow client to allocate own buffer; the client
00469     /// must determine the correct size beforehand, or an exception will be thrown
00470     void getMZIntensityPairs(MZIntensityPair* output, size_t expectedSize) const;
00471

00511 
00512 /// 
00513 /// Interface for accessing spectra, which may be stored in memory
00514 /// or backed by a data file (RAW, mzXML, mzML).  
00515 ///
00516 /// Implementation notes:
00517 ///
00518 /// - Implementations are expected to keep a spectrum index in the form of
00519 ///   vector<SpectrumIdentity> or equivalent.  The default find*() functions search
00520 ///   the index linearly.  Implementations may provide constant time indexing.
00521 ///
00522 /// - The semantics of spectrum() may vary slightly with implementation.  In particular,
00523 ///   a SpectrumList implementation that is backed by a file may choose either to cache 
00524 ///   or discard the SpectrumPtrs for future access, with the caveat that the client 
00525 ///   may write to the underlying data.
00526 ///
00527 /// - It is the implementation's responsibility to return a valid SpectrumPtr from spectrum().
00528 ///   If this cannot be done, an exception must be thrown. 
00529 /// 
00530 /// - The 'getBinaryData' flag is a hint if false : implementations may provide valid 
00531 ///   BinaryDataArrayPtrs on spectrum(index, false);  implementations *must* provide 
00532 ///   valid BinaryDataArrayPtrs on spectrum(index, true).
00533 ///
00534 class PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumList
00535 {
00536     public:
00537     
00538     /// returns the number of spectra
00539     virtual size_t size() const = 0;
00540 
00541     /// returns true iff (size() == 0)
00542     virtual bool empty() const;
00543 
00544     /// access to a spectrum index
00545     virtual const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity(size_t index) const = 0;
00546 
00547     /// find id in the spectrum index (returns size() on failure)
00548     virtual size_t find(const std::string& id) const;
00549 
00550     /// find nativeID in the spectrum index (returns size() on failure)
00551     virtual size_t findNative(const std::string& nativeID) const;
00552 
00553     /// retrieve a spectrum by index
00554     /// - binary data arrays will be provided if (getBinaryData == true);
00555     /// - client may assume the underlying Spectrum* is valid 
00556     virtual SpectrumPtr spectrum(size_t index, bool getBinaryData = false) const = 0;
00557 
00558     virtual ~SpectrumList(){} 
00559 };
00560 
00561 
00562 typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumList> SpectrumListPtr;
00563 
00564 
00565 /// Simple writeable in-memory implementation of SpectrumList.
00566 /// Note:  This spectrum() implementation returns internal SpectrumPtrs.
00567 struct PWIZ_API_DECL SpectrumListSimple : public SpectrumList
00568 {
00569     std::vector<SpectrumPtr> spectra;
00570 
00571     // SpectrumList implementation
00572 
00573     virtual size_t size() const {return spectra.size();}
00574     virtual bool empty() const {return spectra.empty();}
00575     virtual const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity(size_t index) const;
00576     virtual SpectrumPtr spectrum(size_t index, bool getBinaryData) const;
00577 };
00578 
00579 
00580 typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumListSimple> SpectrumListSimplePtr;

00583 class PWIZ_API_DECL ChromatogramList
00584 {
00585     public:
00586     
00587     /// returns the number of chromatograms 
00588     virtual size_t size() const = 0;
00589 
00590     /// returns true iff (size() == 0)
00591     bool empty() const;
00592 
00593     /// access to a chromatogram index
00594     virtual const ChromatogramIdentity& chromatogramIdentity(size_t index) const = 0;
00595 
00596     /// find id in the chromatogram index (returns size() on failure)
00597     virtual size_t find(const std::string& id) const;
00598 
00599     /// find nativeID in the chromatogram index (returns size() on failure)
00600     virtual size_t findNative(const std::string& nativeID) const;
00601 
00602     /// retrieve a chromatogram by index
00603     /// - binary data arrays will be provided if (getBinaryData == true);
00604     /// - client may assume the underlying Chromatogram* is valid 
00605     virtual ChromatogramPtr chromatogram(size_t index, bool getBinaryData = false) const = 0;
00606 
00607     virtual ~ChromatogramList(){} 
00608 };
00609

00611 typedef boost::shared_ptr<ChromatogramList> ChromatogramListPtr;

00614 /// Simple writeable in-memory implementation of ChromatogramList.
00615 /// Note:  This chromatogram() implementation returns internal ChromatogramPtrs.
00616 struct PWIZ_API_DECL ChromatogramListSimple : public ChromatogramList
00617 {
00618     std::vector<ChromatogramPtr> chromatograms;
00619 
00620     // ChromatogramList implementation
00621 
00622     virtual size_t size() const {return chromatograms.size();}
00623     virtual bool empty() const {return chromatograms.empty();}
00624     virtual const ChromatogramIdentity& chromatogramIdentity(size_t index) const;
00625     virtual ChromatogramPtr chromatogram(size_t index, bool getBinaryData) const;
00626 };

00632 struct PWIZ_API_DECL Run : public ParamContainer
00633 {
00634     std::string id;
00635     InstrumentConfigurationPtr defaultInstrumentConfigurationPtr;
00636     SamplePtr samplePtr;
00637     std::string startTimeStamp;
00638     std::vector<SourceFilePtr> sourceFilePtrs;
00639     SpectrumListPtr spectrumListPtr;
00640     ChromatogramListPtr chromatogramListPtr;
00641 
00642     Run(){}
00643     bool empty() const;
00644 
00645     private:
00646     // no copying - any implementation must handle:
00647     // - SpectrumList cloning
00648     // - internal cross-references to heap-allocated objects 
00649     Run(const Run&);
00650     Run& operator=(const Run&);
00651 };

00654 struct PWIZ_API_DECL MSData
00655 {
00656     std::string accession;
00657     std::string id;
00658     std::string version;
00659     std::vector<CV> cvs; 
00660     FileDescription fileDescription;
00661     std::vector<ParamGroupPtr> paramGroupPtrs;
00662     std::vector<SamplePtr> samplePtrs;
00663     std::vector<InstrumentConfigurationPtr> instrumentConfigurationPtrs;
00664     std::vector<SoftwarePtr> softwarePtrs;
00665     std::vector<DataProcessingPtr> dataProcessingPtrs;
00666     std::vector<AcquisitionSettingsPtr> acquisitionSettingsPtrs;
00667     Run run;
00668 
00669     MSData();
00670     ~MSData();
00671     bool empty() const;
00672 
00673     private:
00674     // no copying
00675     MSData(const MSData&);
00676     MSData& operator=(const MSData&);
00677 };
